About Us

Voice for Silent

Voice for Silent is a student-led organization committed to amplifying the voices of marginalized and underrepresented groups. We stay informed about both the most current global issues and long-standing concerns.

If you have ideas, suggestions, or would like to join us, please don't hesitate to get in touch!
